fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
Factional chat
Factional kill
All roles are AI Generated
If anything sounds wierd, the host has a final say on it

fields.name: Other Features:
fields.value:
Members of The Brainless have the ability to swap roles with each other once per night.
On every Tuesday or Friday during the host's timezone, the abilities of all Brainless' roles become empowered and they usually get a buff, they are empowered even if Tuesday/Friday ends in the middle of a game phase.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rot the brains of the town

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Rot the brains of the town
